document_data.name: ''Amulet of Terror''
document_data.mainbody: An '''''amulet of terror''''' was a [[handglyph]] used by the [[Geomancer]]s of [[Kadar]].
document_data.Powers:
This amulet cloaked the wielder in a purple aura of awful power. Anyone within a {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}} radius of the wielder would be frozen in terror and unable to perform any other actions for several minutes.

Most ''amulets of terror'' had between 20â€”50 charges.
document_data.Description: These items could be found in a variety of shapes and sizes.
